articles.description: Bill Cosby was minutes away from hearing his fate in a civil trial that's been ongoing for a couple weeks now -- but he got a reprieve ... apparently because of budget cuts.
articles.content:

articles.title: Kate Bush’s ‘Running Up That Hill’ Sets Three Chart Records And Hits UK No. 1 - Deadline
articles.description: The power of television compels you. Kate Bush has now broken three UK chart records by hitting No. 1. (It’s No. 4 in the US on the BIllboard Hot 100 singles chart). In the UK, Bush is the oldest woman to top the singles chart, and her achievement of doing so…
